name: Software Engineer/Инженер-программист
description:
PLEASE send your CV in English

Job Qualifications:

  • MS in Software Engineering or Computer Science or related field
  • Practical experience in software development is required
  • English language skills (intermediate) is required
  • Experience participating in team-oriented projects is preferable
  • Background/experience in EDA (electronic design automation) or CAD/CAM is preferable, but not required

Technical Skills:

  • Deep understanding of S/W Development basics, including algorithms and data structures, OOD/OOP and design patterns
  • Practical knowledge of C/C++ language, Microsoft Visual Studio, MFC, ATL, STL is essential
  • Practical knowledge of scripting languages, especially Python, is a plus
  • Knowledge of source control and bug tracking tools is a plus
  • Linux experience is a plus
  • Strong communication skills are required
  • Technical writing skills (requirements, functional specifications) is a plus

Job Duties:

The Software Engineer’s responsibility is to act as a member of a Siemens development team and develop and maintain software products used by electrical engineers in the design of high-speed printed circuit boards

  • Design, develop, modify, and implement software programming for products (both internal and external) with focus on surpassing customer expectations and achieving high quality and on-time delivery
  • Responsible for ensuring the overall functional quality of the released product on all required platforms
  • Ability to understand complex products, solutions, and problems
  • Works without supervision on complex projects with complete latitude for independent judgment and technical expertise
  • Creates, documents, and executes software designs which may involve significant re-architecture of important systems, defining and coordinating implementation with wide-reaching impacts
  • Provides high-level technical expertise, including performing in-depth and complex software-systems programming and analysis
  • Possesses broad knowledge of operating systems, applications implications, and customer areas

Note:

Overall, we seek someone with the required technical skills who is also a good team player, and open-minded and ready to learn. Those qualities can compensate for lack of previous experience in the EDA or CAM/CAD domains.
